Dataset Name: Tertiary lymphoid structures generate and propagate anti-tumor antibody-producing plasma cells in renal cell cancer
Dataset Description: The presence of intratumoral tertiary lymphoid structures (TLS) is associated with positive clinical outcomes and responses to immunotherapy in cancer. Here, we used spatial transcriptomics to examine the nature of B cell responses within TLS in renal cell carcinoma (RCC). B cells were enriched in TLS, and therein, we could identify all B cell maturation stages toward plasma cell (PC) formation. B(Read more on Pubmed)
Dataset Design: Spatial transcriptomics of fresh frozen ccRCC human tumors
